title: Missing Input Validation
description: User input is processed without validation or sanitization.
risk: Leads to security vulnerabilities and application crashes.
explanation: Unchecked input may contain malicious or malformed data.
fix: Validate and sanitize all user inputs.

title: Missing Error Handling
description: Errors are not properly caught or handled.
risk: Leads to crashes and poor debugging experience.
explanation: Unhandled exceptions can terminate the application.
fix: Wrap risky code in try-catch blocks.
